base_description: White, three-piece faucet set with curved spout.
part_description: Includes a central curved spout and two side handles. The spout is arched and centrally positioned, while the handles are cylindrical with lever tops, symmetrically placed on either side.
internal_interaction_description: The central spout channels water flow, controlled by the two side handles. Each handle regulates either hot or cold water, mixing them within the spout for temperature adjustment. The handles connect to internal valves that open or close the water supply when turned.
external_interaction_description: The faucet set is installed on a sink or countertop, interacting with plumbing systems for water supply. Users turn the handles to adjust water flow and temperature. The spout directs water into the basin, facilitating tasks like washing hands or filling containers.
